page.original:
&ltTBL>.DECRYPT() Syntax Result_Flag as L = &ltTBL>.DECRYPT() Description The &ltTBL>.DECRYPT() method decrypts the table referenced by the object pointer, &ltTBL>. The Result_Flag is .T. (TRUE) if the operation is successful. Alpha Anywhere requires exclusive access to the table in order to decrypt it. Example Decrypt a table default_encryption_key_set("swordfish") 'because the default key was set, do not have to supply password for the table.open() method t = table.open("customer") t.decrypt() t.close()
See Also Table Functions and Methods, Encryption Functions and Methods
